This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO Followed straight path then disappeared
divs: sighting detailswhile driving north between pisgah and murfreesboro, arkansas, i noticed orangish ball\sphere shaped object at least 1 mile high traveling south. my brother and i stopped the vehicle and got out and watched it continue south and then disappear within a blink of an eye. sighting lasted aprox 2 mins.
